text: ... Chipping away at articles regarding a bunch of experiments towards creating higher level syntax for programming languages. Thus far, I've managed to consolidate t2t (text-to-text transpilation) into a single .mjs file and to redocument it. Wrote an adjunct article about experimenting with "t2t" using a toy meta-programming language to generate code in existing languages. "T2T creates DSLs. T2T reduces the amount of work required to build a DSL. You should be able to create a new DSL in an afternoon. ..." <https://open.substack.com/pub/programmingsimplicity/p/experiments-with-text-to-text-transpilation?r=1egdky&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web>

attachments.fallback: Experiments With Text to Text Transpilation
attachments.text: Towards Higher Level Syntax for Programming Languages 2024-09-07
attachments.title: Experiments With Text to Text Transpilation

elements.text: ... Chipping away at articles regarding a bunch of experiments towards creating higher level syntax for programming languages. Thus far, I've managed to consolidate t2t (text-to-text transpilation) into a single .mjs file and to redocument it. Wrote an adjunct article about experimenting with "t2t" using a toy meta-programming language to generate code in existing languages. "T2T creates DSLs. T2T reduces the amount of work required to build a DSL. You should be able to create a new DSL in an afternoon. ..."
